title: re-add a deleted user, old files exist but can not be viewed
body:
expected behavior
user directories created without any files existing in them

actual behavior
user directory created with pre-existing files contained on the server, but not in the cache.

steps to reproduce
user is configured in owncloud and has files stored


![delete_user](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/968909/4f7846fa-05b2-11e3-92ce-f3bdcfe2e1e0.png)


 
user is then deleted from owncloud
after a refresh of the page by the admin, which seems to confirm the delete, the user’s directory is removed from the server
 


![delete_user_2](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/968910/54d91c64-05b2-11e3-9317-cb930a567000.png)

	
user is created with same user name as the one previously deleted
the user’s previous files appear on the storage server.  they do not appear in cache, and cannot be viewed on either the server or the web



![delete_user_3](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/968914/5ba61da8-05b2-11e3-9fcf-bd589a5a8e95.png)

 


server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.15","versionstring":"5.0.10"}

client configuration
browser: ie9, ie 10, chrome,
